laboratory_examinations.findings: Results of cultures of blood samples obtained prior to receipt of antibiotics were sterile.
Vitreous cultures revealed branching fungal hyphae, confirmed to be Aspergillus fumigatus.
Cultures of specimens obtained from the affected prosthesis grew A. fumigatus.
Cultures of specimens obtained during this procedure grew A. fumigatus.
Results of culture of the resected vessel specimens were again positive for A. fumigatus.
Demonstrated complete dehiscence of the valve in the absence of vegetations.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial echocardiogram showed new prosthetic valve vegetation with abscess formation; later demonstrated resolution.
